overview_of_class: Examines the theories and methods used to understand digital media consumption, emphasizing quantitative research and macro-level phenomena. Emerging patterns of use are assessed in the context of marketing, social effects and public policy. The course provides access to current comScore data to give students hands-on opportunities to explore patterns of Web use.
name: Audience Analysis
title: SoC COMM_ST 355-0-20 Audience Analysis
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Sophomores, Juniors, and Seniors from every undergraduate school only.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Examines the theories and methods used to understand digital media consumption, emphasizing quantitative research and macro-level phenomena. Emerging patterns of use are assessed in the context of marketing, social effects and public policy. The course provides access to current comScore data to give students hands-on opportunities to explore patterns of Web use.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Webster, J. G., Phalen, P. F., & Lichty, L. W. (2014). Ratings Analysis: Audience Measurement and Analytics (4th Edition). New York: Routledge.

subject: COMM_ST
